testsuite.name: This test tests, if

testcase.name: the match announces the right players name.
a player with a winning hand is declared the winner (Only Straight). 1 Straight of 8, 2 of 3.
a player with a winning hand is declared the winner (Only Flush). 2 flushes of 4, 2 of 3.
a player with a winning hand is declared the winner (No Joker). 1 straight of 6. 2 flushes of 4
a player with a winning hand is declared the winner (one Joker). 1 straight of 5. 2 flushes of 4
a player with a winning hand is declared the winner (two Joker). 1 straight of 8. 2 flushes of 2
a player without winning hand is told not to have won.
a player with a winning hand is declared the winner. Flush warp around (12->13->1).
the match will terminate after someone won the game.
two players and then a match can be instantiated.
when we have an instance of a match the first player has a hand of tokens, with 15 Tokens (no null).
when we have an instance of a match the all other players, but the first, have a hand of tokens, with 14 Tokens and one heavy.
when we have an instance of a match the the players have different hands of tokens.
the match starts, greets and asks the player to throw a token.
the match answers to a thrown token, which was in ones hand, correctly (first player).
the match asks which Token the player wants and answers to a thrown token, which was in ones hand, correctly (second player).

testsuite.system-out:

This combination is [[Gelb 9, Gelb 10, Rot 1, Rot 2, Rot 3, Rot 4, Rot 9, Rot 10, Rot 12, Rot 13, Blau 9, Blau 10, Schwarz 9, Schwarz 10]] Hakan:[Gelb 1, Gelb 3, Gelb 4, Gelb 5, Rot 3, Rot 5, Rot 6, Rot 8, Rot 11, Rot 12, Blau 1, Blau 5, Blau 6, Schwarz 4, Schwarz 6] Okan:[Gelb 9, Gelb 10, Rot 1, Rot 2, Rot 3, Rot 4, Rot 9, Rot 10, Rot 11, Rot 12, Rot 13, Blau 9, Blau 10, Schwarz 9, Schwarz 10] Okan:[Gelb 9, Gelb 10, Rot 1, Rot 2, Rot 3, Rot 4, Rot 9, Rot 10, Rot 11, Rot 11, Rot 12, Rot 13, Blau 9, Blau 10, Schwarz 9] Hakan:[Joker, Gelb 8, Gelb 9, Rot 1, Rot 2, Rot 6, Rot 7, Blau 3, Blau 4, Blau 6, Blau 11, Blau 13, Schwarz 5, Schwarz 6, Schwarz 7] [Match starts!!, Please throw the first Token, Hakan., The thrown Token is {Rot 11}., It's Okans turn., Do you want to take the thrown Token {Rot 11} or get a new one?, There is 1 winning combination., This combination is [[Gelb 9, Gelb 10, Rot 1, Rot 2, Rot 3, Rot 4, Rot 9, Rot 10, Rot 11, Rot 12, Rot 13, Blau 9, Blau 10, Schwarz 9]], The winner is Okan. Congratulations!!, The next match is about to start.
, Match starts!!, Please throw the first Token, Hakan., A player left or exited the game.] Hakan:[Gelb 9, Rot 1, Rot 3, Rot 5, Rot 6, Rot 8, Blau 6, Blau 7, Blau 11, Blau 13, Schwarz 2, Schwarz 5, Schwarz 5, Schwarz 8, Schwarz 12] Hakan:[Joker, Gelb 5, Gelb 6, Gelb 7, Gelb 11, Rot 5, Rot 6, Rot 10, Rot 12, Blau 3, Blau 5, Blau 6, Blau 9, Blau 10, Schwarz 13] Okan:[Gelb 3, Gelb 4, Gelb 4, Gelb 8, Rot 3, Rot 9, Rot 11, Blau 1, Blau 4, Schwarz 1, Schwarz 2, Schwarz 11, Schwarz 12, Schwarz 12, Heavy] Hakan:[Gelb 1, Gelb 2, Rot 7, Rot 12, Rot 13, Blau 5, Blau 5, Blau 8, Blau 8, Blau 9, Blau 11, Blau 13, Schwarz 3, Schwarz 8, Schwarz 12] Okan:[Gelb 6, Gelb 6, Rot 2, Rot 3, Rot 7, Rot 10, Rot 13, Blau 1, Blau 7, Blau 13, Schwarz 5, Schwarz 7, Schwarz 7, Schwarz 13, Heavy] Okan:[Gelb 4, Gelb 6, Gelb 6, Rot 2, Rot 3, Rot 7, Rot 10, Rot 13, Blau 1, Blau 7, Blau 13, Schwarz 5, Schwarz 7, Schwarz 7, Schwarz 13] Hakan:[Gelb 1, Gelb 2, Rot 7, Rot 12, Rot 13, Blau 5, Blau 5, Blau 8, Blau 8, Blau 9, Blau 11, Blau 13, Schwarz 3, Schwarz 8, Heavy]
